basics.name: Amir Gafner
basics.label: Senior Web Developer
basics.summary: An abstract thinker that can look beyond the syntax and tools, focusing on solution. 6+ years of experience, expert knowledge of JavaScript, coupled with experience in Nodejs, Python.

work.summary: Reactful is a real time conversion platform that helps you convert those visitors on your sites, letting you create powerful Reactions to your visitors.
highlights: Developed and designed Reactful products from the bottom up. Responsible for team repository, releases and feature roadmaps.
Using Webpack, Babel, ES2017, React and Redux.
Crafted user experiences, integrated design and system architecture. Implemented technologies including GCS, Stripe, Intercom and Segment

work.summary: Spin particles to their outer magnetic bound and find a clear route through the endlessly expanding vortex cloud.  Master time and space to keep expanding.
highlights: Invented and designed Spinbound - cross platform mobile game.
Built with cocos2dx C++ Game engine for android and IOS.
Integrating Google Analytics, Google play services, Apple Game center and Admob services.

work.summary: The Tool That Makes Your Airbnb Business a Success.
highlights: Full stack Javascript development - MeanJS stack.
Developing single page application for managing reservations, booking insights history, along with pricing analytics and listing stats.
Integrating Stripe and Firebase for real time operation system.

work.summary: Somoto Ltd. offers various solutions to software developers, publishers, advertisers, and Website owners for the distribution of software worldwide.
highlights: Leading front end development, responsible for a reporting system with data tables, graphs and charts
Using Backbone and Marionette over NginX and Php Symfony framework.
Building cross browser dynamically loaded extensions components.

work.summary: Moovu is the best way to discover, collect and share the coolest videos from YouTube, Facebook, Vimeo and much more.
highlights: Build a tool for creating a short meme gif youtube preview using canvas.
Worked in close collaboration within a cross-functional team.

keywords: Codeing, Music, Art, Philosophy, International Relations, Mars
